item.description:
This is my friend from grad school's band, but truth is, even if I weren't friends with the band I'd probably see them anyway - they put on a great show! Good live acoustic set - they have a number of originals but also do some great covers (james, kings of leon, foo fighters - the crowd pleasers)! Anyhow, I'll be going to this show one way or the other, but would love to have some company!

Please note - I may be running a few minutes late to this - I'm going to be coming directly from BU's commencement, and since I'm working as a Marshal how late I need to stay is up in the air. I should nearly definitely be able to make it by 9:45 though...

http://www.myspace.co... to check out the band - they're really great, and I'd love to have some fellow dancers/music appreciators come out to join me! Especially if you've had a nice long afternoon in the park, this will be a nice way to cap off the evening!

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: "Pretty Impressive" at Porter Belly's Pub in Brighton
